task.title: Control the number of sprocket teeth

step.cmd: Find the Maximum number of sprocket teeth variable (GEARTEETHNUMBER).
Set the value to be sufficient for used sprockets (500 is recommended).

div.note: Larger values slow down the update of standard sprockets. If the value is smaller than the required number, only that number of sprocket teeth displays.

step.cmd: If applicable, update the document to make sprocket teeth appear on existing parts:

ul.li: Temporarily set the Assembly components updating mode (BMUPDATEMODE) to [1] Update all components.
Use command BmUpdate to update the document.
If applicable, return the Assembly components updating mode (BMUPDATEMODE) to the previous value.
